description.displayText:
I recommend Amanda as she was an awesome babysitter to my children. She watched my kids twice a week over the summer and it was a joy to have her. 
Amanda always came to our home on time, cheerful and ready to engage with the children. She is intelligent, kind and a great listener. My kids love Amanda, and would always look forward to spending time with her. That said, she always followed our directions in regards to the children (bedtimes, food, etc.) and they respect her as an authority figure. We still engage her services about two evenings per month. 
By hiring Amanda, you can be assured that you won't get a teenager who lounges around watching TV while your kids fend for themselves. Amanda is fun and hardworking, any family that hires her has very fortunate children.

description.displayText:
It was my pleasure to have Amanda O. as a babysitter for my child age 9. As a single father, it has been delightful to have a dependable individual to help me care for my daughter. Amanda would pick up my daughter at the bus stop every day after school and looked after her until I arrived home from work. Amanda was trustworthy enough to where she was given a key to my house. 
 She always went above and beyond her specific responsibilities like your traditional house hold chores such as folding laundry, washing dishes, helping my daughter tidy her room, and start on dinner if I was running late.
 I highly recommend Amanda for any job working with children. She has been an excellent role model for my little girl and a kind and nurturing babysitter. 
 I am happy for Amanda is she graduates from high school with honors and goes off to college, but my daughter and I will miss her terribly. I do not know if I can find such an amazing babysitter to take her place.

-Israel D.

description.displayText:
The word is out, Amanda O. is the best! She worked at my home as a babysitter for two years mostly weekends. During this duration, I have had the satisfaction of seeing her grow from a high school student to a mature young lady pursuing her Bachelor's Degree. I believe that she is competent and experienced enough to fit any childcare capacity. Amanda took care of my son and daughter ages six and two during my absence. She prepared nutritious meals and took them on outings to the park, to get ice cream, etc. I have had the highest confidence in her trustworthiness, judgment and maturity and always felt relaxed after leaving my kids in her care. 
 She was more than a babysitter as she proved herself a member of our family. My children and I are sad to see her leave but we know that she has to advance in her career. I wish her the best of luck in her future endeavors. 

Sincerely, 

Ashley C.
